info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 6:28AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Defiance, Henry and southeastern Fulton Counties through 700 AM EDT... At 627 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Defiance, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Napoleon around 645 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Liberty Center and Mcclure. This includes Interstate 80 in Ohio near mile marker 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
